resources.string: Your phone has less than %dMB of storage space. To keep things running smoothly, increase the amount of available storage. The low storage wizard can help you do this. Would you like to run it now?
Your phone has less than %dMB of internal storage left. Run the low storage wizard now to free up additional space.
Clean internal storage by clean application cache, move to SD or uninstall
Clean internal storage by clean application cache, move to phone storage or uninstall
Clean internal storage by clean application cache, move to tablet storage or uninstall
The following steps will help you increase storage space.
You can make more storage space by either moving apps to your phone storage or uninstalling unused apps.
You can make more storage space by either moving apps to your tablet storage or uninstalling unused apps.
"You can make more storage space by clearing out your apps' temporary data."
"Clear temporary data for apps that I haven't used in the past week"
Clear temporary data for all apps
Clear temporary data for apps and remove email attachments.
Increase storage space by removing unnecessary data
Increase storage space by removing unnecessary data
You can make more storage space by either moving apps to your SD card or uninstalling unused apps.
Select installed apps to move from internal storage to SD card.
Moving the selected apps to your storage card will free up more than %dMB of internal storage.
SD card storage is full and cannot complete the moving application to SD card process. Please free more storage on SD card and run the wizard again.
Unable to complete the moving application to SD card process.
Select installed apps to move from internal storage to phone storage.
Select installed apps to move from internal storage to tablet storage.
Phone storage is full and cannot complete the moving application to phone storage process. Please free more storage on phone storage and run the wizard again.
Tablet storage is full and cannot complete the moving application to tablet storage process. Please free more storage on tablet storage and run the wizard again.
Unable to complete the moving application to phone storage process.
Unable to complete the moving application to tablet storage process.
Select apps to uninstall from your phone.
Uninstalling the selected apps will free up more than %dMB of internal storage.
Select apps to uninstall from your tablet.
You can change your mail and messages settings to make more storage space.
Delete old messages as limits are reached
Set number of messages to save: %1$s~%2$s
To free up space, you can move some apps to the storage card or uninstall some apps.
To free up space, you can move some apps to the phone storage or uninstall some apps.
To free up space, you can move some apps to the tablet storage or uninstall some apps.
